title: AI Voice Memos
description: Record, transcribe, and summarize conversations with one tap. Perfect for meetings and quick notes.

title: Smart Search
description: Find anything across your documents with AI-powered semantic search. Understands context and meaning.

title: Dark Mode
description: Easier on the eyes with a beautiful dark theme that adapts to your system preferences.

title: Real-time Collaboration
description: Work together with your team in real-time. See changes as they happen with live cursors.

title: Mobile App Redesign
description: Completely redesigned mobile experience with faster performance and intuitive gestures.

title: API v2 Beta
description: New REST and GraphQL APIs with improved performance, better documentation, and more capabilities.

title: Advanced Analytics
description: Gain insights into your workflow with detailed analytics dashboards and custom reports.

title: AI Assistant
description: Your personal AI assistant that helps you write, analyze, and automate tasks throughout the app.

title: Enterprise Integrations
description: Connect with Salesforce, SAP, and other enterprise tools. Single sign-on and audit logging included.

title: Offline Mode
description: Work without internet connection. Your changes sync automatically when you're back online.
